typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract InsertionSorter,contract ArtERC20Token,contract Diamond,address,uint256,address payable,uint256,uint256,uint256) returns (contract HashedClosedAuction)

nodes.documentation:
Create a simple auction with `_biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `_beneficiary`.
